title: Race Science? Or Human Variation? A Discussion with Bo Winegard
description:
Bo Winegard and Noah Carl's latest Quillette article Superior: the Return of Race Science - A Review, created quite the stir on twitter. I had many questions, playing devil's advocate and Bo was thoughtful and measured in all of his answers. Thoroughly enjoyed this one

Podcast: https://anchor.fm/podcast-9b57fe4/episodes/Race-Science--Or-Human-Variation--A-Discussion-with-Bo-Winegard-e4g94r

Bo's article. Follow him on twitter @EPoe187
https://quillette.com/author/bo-winegard-and-noah-carl/

Follow me:
twitter: @theother_95
Instagram: @theother95
Facebook: @theother95page
Email me: theotherninetyfive@gmail.com
